(defttag :parinfer-fixer)
*parinfer-rust-cmd*constant
(defconst *parinfer-rust-cmd* "parinfer-rust")
*parinfer-default-mode*constant
(defconst *parinfer-default-mode* "indent")
*parinfer-lisp-options*constant
(defconst *parinfer-lisp-options* "--lisp-block-comments")
parens-balanced-simple-auxfunction
(defun parens-balanced-simple-aux
  (chars parens brackets braces)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program))
  (if (endp chars)
    (and (= parens 0) (= brackets 0) (= braces 0))
    (let ((ch (car chars)))
      (cond ((eql ch #\() (parens-balanced-simple-aux (cdr chars)
            (1+ parens)
            brackets
            braces))
        ((eql ch #\)) (if (> parens 0)
            (parens-balanced-simple-aux (cdr chars)
              (1- parens)
              brackets
              braces)
            nil))
        ((eql ch #\[) (parens-balanced-simple-aux (cdr chars)
            parens
            (1+ brackets)
            braces))
        ((eql ch #\]) (if (> brackets 0)
            (parens-balanced-simple-aux (cdr chars)
              parens
              (1- brackets)
              braces)
            nil))
        ((eql ch #\{) (parens-balanced-simple-aux (cdr chars)
            parens
            brackets
            (1+ braces)))
        ((eql ch #\}) (if (> braces 0)
            (parens-balanced-simple-aux (cdr chars)
              parens
              brackets
              (1- braces))
            nil))
        (t (parens-balanced-simple-aux (cdr chars)
            parens
            brackets
            braces))))))
parens-balanced-simplefunction
(defun parens-balanced-simple
  (str)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program))
  (let ((chars (coerce str 'list)))
    (parens-balanced-simple-aux chars 0 0 0)))
run-shell-command-with-inputfunction
(defun run-shell-command-with-input
  (cmd input-str state)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program :stobjs state))
  (b* ((temp-in "/tmp/parinfer-input.lisp") (temp-out "/tmp/parinfer-output.lisp")
      ((mv channel state) (open-output-channel temp-in :character state))
      ((when (not channel)) (mv "Failed to open temp input file" "" state))
      (state (princ$ input-str channel state))
      (state (close-output-channel channel state))
      (full-cmd (concatenate 'string
          cmd
          " < "
          temp-in
          " > "
          temp-out
          " 2>&1"))
      ((mv exit-code ?cmd-output state) (sys-call+ "sh" (list "-c" full-cmd) state))
      (output (read-file-into-string2 temp-out 0 nil :default state)))
    (if (and (not exit-code) output)
      (mv nil output state)
      (mv (concatenate 'string
          "Command failed with exit code: "
          (coerce (explode-atom (or exit-code -1) 10) 'string))
        (or output "")
        state))))
parinfer-fix-codefunction
(defun parinfer-fix-code
  (code state)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program :stobjs state))
  (let* ((cmd (concatenate 'string
         ". "$HOME/.cargo/env" && "
         *parinfer-rust-cmd*
         " -m "
         *parinfer-default-mode*
         " "
         *parinfer-lisp-options*)))
    (run-shell-command-with-input cmd code state)))
parinfer-fix-code-with-modefunction
(defun parinfer-fix-code-with-mode
  (code mode state)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program :stobjs state))
  (let* ((cmd (concatenate 'string
         ". "$HOME/.cargo/env" && "
         *parinfer-rust-cmd*
         " -m "
         mode
         " "
         *parinfer-lisp-options*)))
    (run-shell-command-with-input cmd code state)))
check-and-fix-lisp-codefunction
(defun check-and-fix-lisp-code
  (code state)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program :stobjs state))
  (if (parens-balanced-simple code)
    (b* (((mv err fixed state) (parinfer-fix-code code state)))
      (if err
        (mv nil err code state)
        (mv (not (equal code fixed)) nil fixed state)))
    (b* (((mv err fixed state) (parinfer-fix-code code state)))
      (if err
        (mv nil err code state)
        (mv t nil fixed state)))))
fix-lisp-code-with-reportfunction
(defun fix-lisp-code-with-report
  (code state)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program :stobjs state))
  (b* (((mv was-fixed err fixed state) (check-and-fix-lisp-code code state)))
    (cond (err (mv (concatenate 'string "[Parinfer Error] " err)
          code
          state))
      (was-fixed (mv "[Parinfer] Fixed unbalanced parentheses" fixed state))
      (t (mv nil code state)))))
test-parinfermacro
(defmacro test-parinfer
  (code)
  `(make-event (mv-let (err result state)
      (parinfer-fix-code ,CODE state)
      (if err
        (prog2$ (cw "Error: ~s0~%" err)
          (mv nil '(value-triple :error) state))
        (prog2$ (cw "Result:~%~s0~%" result)
          (mv nil '(value-triple :ok) state))))))
*test-cases*constant
(defconst *test-cases*
  '("(defun foo (x)n  (+ x 1" "(defun bar (x)n  (+ x 1)))"
    "(defun baz (x)n  (+ x 1))"
    "(let ((a 1)n      (b 2))n  (+ a b"
    "(defun f1 (x) x)n(defun f2 (y) y"))
